A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Much the same way Empire Strikes Back was a character play that took a deep dive into all of the original characters and their relationships with one another\, so too is The Last Jedi\, which takes us on Rey's journey of self discovery.  I thought the pace was good\, and the action sequences were quite satisfying.  I liked how conflicted Luke was\, thought the cameo appearance of Yoda was appropriate and well written\, and overall thought this movie was a great \"passing of the torch\"...  Looking forward to the next one!
